title: FT: Mathewson white cap and Bastian - TRADED
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Mathewson white cap and Bastian - TRADED
posts.post_content:
Have these for trade. Looking for EPDGs I need which are listed below the scans. Let me know if you have any.

PM your email address and I can forward higher res scans

Thanks for looking!
